description: Introducing the new Superior 6, designed with everything you need and nothing you don’t. Ready to connect with the dirt for fast trail excursions. This trail runner’s light-weight construction makes for the perfect option when it comes to speeding things up. Equipped with a MaxTrac™ outsole for traction on the trails, this Superior is your go-to for your daily trail outings.
name: Altra Superior 6 - Mens
